name: Save the Gotchi
description:
Game style 

Save the Gotchi is a simple 2D side-scrolling game, it focuses on precision  and speed in order to challenge the player, the faster you clear the level  the more points you'll get. 

Objectives
  • Navigate through levels and collect all the  batteries as fast as possible.
  • (Optionally) Collect all the cassettes to get extra points but be warned, sometimes these are really frustrating to get.
  • Depending on your time you'll be assigned a grade.
  • Avoid hitting the skulls, you'll go back to the beginning and waste time but the batteries and cassettes that you already collected will still be with you.
Features
  • Pixel art.
  • Original music & sounds.
  • Simple yet difficult.
  • Available for  Windows, Linux & Android.
Tested on
  • Windows 10
  • Android 10 (Google Pixel 3a, Huawei Mate 20 Lite)
  • Arch Linux
  • Ubuntu
